message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $16,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $16,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $13,000. If you're willing to accept that, we can finalize the deal. Otherwise, I'll need to consider other options.

I understand that $13,000 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm offering the product to you for $14,500. This is my final compromise, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but $14,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $14,000.  If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to move on to other options.

I understand that $14,000 is a good offer, but I'm still not willing to give up too much profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $14,000 and $14,500, which would be $14,250. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
